original_text: And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven, but the one who blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven.
korean_text: 누구든지 말로 인자를 거역하면 사하심을 받으려니와 성령을 모독하는 자는 사하심을 받지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 인자를 대하여 말하는 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: but the one who blasphemes against the Holy Spirit
